activities: On behalf of healthcare providers including sleep labs, CleveMed processes identifiable personal data received on its CleveMedSleepView website and database for the purpose of generating sleep apnea testing reports.  Identifiable personal data includes data from patients, healthcare providers and their authorized employees, and sleep labs.
contactoff1: Privacy Officer, Cleveland Medical Devices Inc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden
personaldata: Personal data covered includes personally identifiable information received in the US about patients, healthcare providers and their authorized employees in the EU who utilize CleveMedSleepView portal. CleveMed acts as a processor with regards to such data including manual sleep scoring of the sleep study.
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities (DPA’s) located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
